trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Tallahassee
There were no other sightings in Tallahassee on or around July 4th 1992
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: multiple green lights moved accross road in front of truck
divs: Sighting DetailsJust telling you about this so you can us it in comparison with other sightings.I have left info on other sights about this over the years.Me and my wife were on out way to louisiana to see our daughter in the early 90's.Somewhere between Live oak and Talehassee Fl we saw the UFO.We topped a hill on interstate 10.It was a long stretch going down hill.Off to our right and about a mile away I noticed these green lights moving from our right and angling toward us a little but moving to our left.They were over the tree line and like we were above them as we were higher up at top of this hill.Not a huge hill but for Fl this was pretty high and very long.Think the road curved to the right at bottom.As I was driving down this long stretch I watched the craft until I could not see it because I was nearing the bottom of the hill and now the trees block it off.Suddenly there it was coming accross the road in front of us.I drove under it just as it entered the tree line on my left.I had my head tilted trying to see it better out the side window.Just as I was about to see the other side it disapeared as it moved above the trees on my left.It had what I remember as 6 green lights.They were green like the light on a key board.Not bright like a light bulb but just like on a keyboard.I zeroed in on one of the lights and see it was recessed and could see a rim and the lens was recessed in it.These lights where on the side that on aircraft has red lights.It made no sound and was so close to the tops of the trees it looked like it was almost hitting them.It moved at about the speed of a helicopter but it was so dark that night and I tried real hard to make out the shape of the object but could not make it out.The lights were 2 sets of three lights with both in the same pattern but the one to the right the same but a little higher.Kind of like a triangle with one light a little further apart and slightly cocked or tilted. Three to the left and three to the right.Made me wonder at the time if it was two seperate objects or one object.It would probably be about the size of plane and bigger than a helicopter.I have seen lights just like this on UFO shows but always seem to be of another color than what we saw.I was so wraped up in what I was seeing that I never noticed that my wife was seeing it too.Just as it was out of sight my wife. suddenly said "That was weird".I told her baby we just saw a UFO.It surprised me that she noticed how unusal it was because she is not the type to reflect on stuff like that.We lived in Loxahatchee fla and our house was directly under the landing pathway to the WPB airport.Always planes flying over our home constantly and we lived there 22 years and seeing planes dayly was a routine thing around our home.I was in the military transportations and was the coxswaine on a Mic 8 landing craft.I was always around planes and boats and ships.I know that planes and boats have port and starboad lights with one blinking or statinary white light.Red is on the left and green is on the right.To this day I still am up set that I did not see the lights on the other side.Will always wonder what color they would have been. I know what I saw and not sure if it was some military secret craft or something from who knows where.Just know it was definitly a UFO. I did not take notice of the day, year or month this happened.Just talked about it over the years with people.Just remember my grandson was maybe 2 or 3 years old and he is 21 now and in the air force.It was probably on a Friday because we were on vacation.This actually happened and I know that these things exsist.Always wondered about this stuff and thought people were probably mistaking stuff.Now I know these things are real.0
